headline: RFID4U and Zebra Technologies Announce Joint Webinar: "Enabling RFID for All Retail: Affordable Solutions for Mid-Sized Brand Owners and Retailers"
summary: RFID4U, a global leader in RFID and IoT solutions, and Zebra Technologies Corporation, a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, announce a joint webinar: "Enabling RFID for All Retail: Affordable Solutions for Mid-Sized Brand Owners and Retailers." The webinar will be co-hosted by Zebra and RFID4U and will feature insights from one of the industry leaders, CITY Furniture, showcasing their successful RFID implementation. This session on February 27, 2025 from 2:00-3:00pm

content.title: RFID4U and Zebra Technologies Announce Joint Webinar: "Enabling RFID for All Retail: Affordable Solutions for Mid-Sized Brand Owners and Retailers"

headline: Zebra Technologies Gears Up to Post Q4 Earnings: What to Expect
summary: ZBRA's fourth-quarter results are likely to benefit from the solid demand for mobile computing products and data capture solutions. Weakness in the printing end market is likely to hurt its results.
